intro: Heteromorpha stolzii, commonly known as the Stolz's heteromorpha, is a species of flowering plant native to South Africa. The plant typically grows as a shrub, reaching heights of up to 1 meter, with opposite, lance-shaped leaves. Due to its ornamental value, it is cultivated in various regions outside its native habitat.
